channel.title: Device Problem
channel.description:
I'm having a little problem with opening my device on my computer, it seems when I plug the wire into the computer, and connecting the wire to my music device and attempting to make it open on the computer (all the media files), it doesn't even bother to show up on the 'My Computer' bin.
I've attempted to even have it formatted by plugging it into my Xbox and making it 360 compatiable and then redoing it all over again, but not even that worked! And then I tried plugging it into another computer, and of course not even that worked.
So I was wondering, does anyone have any suggestions on this?

item.title: Device Problem
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

I’m having a little problem with opening my device on my computer, it seems when I plug the wire into the computer, and connecting the wire to my music device and attempting to make it open on the computer (all the media files), it doesn’t even bother to show up on the ‘My Computer’ bin.

I’ve attempted to even have it formatted by plugging it into my Xbox and making it 360 compatiable and then redoing it all over again, but not even that worked! And then I tried plugging it into another computer, and of course not even that worked.

So I was wondering, does anyone have any suggestions on this?
